title: fyoung55
author: fyoung55
content: I'm looking at getting back into mining.  I don't have the power or room for a bulk order, so I'm looking for just one s19, any version is fine, but I'd prefer the one that has the easy sd slot access.  eBay is around $1500, so I'm looking in that price range.  Likely will want escrow unless it is someone I've dealt with in the past.What ya got?

comments.author: Bellachan
comments.body: we have s19 86T in stock HK

comments.author: MinersKing
comments.body: Hello, are you still looking for the miners? If yes, we can provide you the best products with best price!

comments.author: WhyFhy
comments.body: User popojeff https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=2662896 might have one up for grabs! we've been talking on them a while, but I unfortunately had to step off the deal.

comments.author: PopoJeff
comments.body: Quote from: WhyFhy on June 20, 2023, 11:02:20 AMUser popojeff https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=2662896 might have one up for grabs! we've been talking on them a while, but I unfortunately had to step off the deal.Yes, I've got 3 im ready to move.  Haven't run much at all due to soaring power costs. Probably about a year old, with less than a month of run time on them.   I just listed one on eBay for $1750 (to try to offset eBay fees).  Still have two that haven't been spoken for.
